article_title: Paris Attacks Add New Urgency to International Summit
article_text:
ANTALYA, Turkey—President Barack Obama will arrive in Turkey on Sunday for an international summit that has taken on new urgency following the terrorist attacks in Paris, with world leaders calling for an intensified U.S.-led military response to combat Islamic State, which has claimed responsibility for the attacks.

Mr. Obama faces allies in the U.S.-led coalition who have long wanted him to invest more in the fight against Islamic State, particularly in Syria. Before Friday’s attacks in Paris, the White House had...

article_summary:
Before Friday’s attacks in Paris, the White House had...
ANTALYA, Turkey—President Barack Obama will arrive in Turkey on Sunday for an international summit that has taken on new urgency following the terrorist attacks in Paris, with world leaders calling for an intensified U.S.-led military response to combat Islamic State, which has claimed responsibility for the attacks.
Mr. Obama faces allies in the U.S.-led coalition who have long wanted him to invest more in the fight against Islamic State, particularly in Syria.
